name: remilitarization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of bringing military forces back into an area: They were alarmed to learn about the remilitarization of the disputed zone. The remilitarization of this area is forbidden by an international treaty.
the act of making a police force similar to a military force again, for example by giving it military weapons: They had thought that the remilitarization of the police would decrease crime rates but it did not.
More examplesFewer examplesOpposition parties argued that the legislation was a step towards the nation's remilitarization.The British and French did nothing to oppose the remilitarisation of the region.The generals were whipping up anger against neighbouring countries and arguing for remilitarization.
